name: Squid Beat Battle
description:
This new HOT hyper casual music game from Amanotes will surely satisfy most of you

HOW TO PLAY
1. Choose your favorite song
2. Feel the beat .
3. Spread your color all over the place to make this dancefloor yours!!

Numerous well-known songs to choose from
Regular updated new contents
Easy to play with simple control
Spectacular music game experiences
Play with rhythm and music
Unique gameplay and experience
Harder than it looks
